line.text: Against that time (if ever that time come)
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: When I shall see thee frown on my defects
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: When as thy love hath cast his utmost sum
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Called to that audit by advised respects
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Against that time when thou shalt strangely pass
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: And scarcely greet me with that sun thine eye
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: When love converted from the thing it was
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Shall reasons find of settled gravity
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Against that time do I ensconce me here
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Within the knowledge of mine own desert
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: And this my hand against my self uprear
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: To guard the lawful reasons on thy part
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: To leave poor me thou hast the strength of laws
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Since why to love I can allege no cause
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*
